metadata.description: Seaside City is a criminal hive crawling with street thugs, and the mafia is pulling the strings. Pirate Blue, a mob kingpin, has grand plans brewing under the streets of the city, and only Black Hood can stop her! But the danger is real, and the question quickly arises -- does the man make the mask, or is it the other way around..?
metadata.name: The Black Hood (Impact Comics)
